<nowiki>[[File:qreator-192.png||align="left"]]</nowiki>Qreator is an Ubuntu app enables you to easily create your own QR codes to encode different types of information in an efficient, compact and cool way.

This wiki is intended to provide a collaborative space to enable anyone interested in contributing to Qreator to participate.
